p: From all suspected cases, 114/413 (27.6%) were confirmed CHIKV infections, of these 114 cases, 26.3% were detected in 2014 (71/270) and 30.2% in 2015 (43/142) respectively ( Table 1). Of these confirmed CHIKV infections, a total of 70/114 (61.4%) were imported infections ( Table 1, Fig 2A), 53 of them detected in 2014 and 17 in 2015, respectively.
